section_id: ## Appendix E: Higher-Order Corrections from Adaptive Forces

hints.label: thm-adaptive-qsd-app
hints.title: Adaptive Forces at QSD
hints.content:
2827: :label: thm-adaptive-qsd-app
2828: 
2829: At the quasi-stationary distribution, the adaptive force contributions satisfy:
2830: 
2831: 1. **No bulk flow**: $u^i_{\text{QSD}} = O(\varepsilon_F)$
2832: 2. **Detailed balance**: $\rho_{\text{QSD}}(x) \propto \exp\left(-\frac{U(x) + \varepsilon_F V_{\text{fit}}[\rho_{\text{QSD}}](x)}{k_B T_{\text{eff}}}\right)$ to first order
2833: 3. **Vanishing source**: $J^\nu_{\text{adapt}}[\mu_{\text{QSD}}] = 0$ since $\partial \rho_{\text{QSD}}/\partial t = 0$
2834: 4. **Anisotropic stress**: $T_{ij} = m\rho \frac{k_B T_{\text{eff}}}{m} \left[\delta^{ij} + \varepsilon_F \Delta G^{ij}(x) + O(\varepsilon_F^2)\right]$
2835: 
2836: **Consequence**: At leading order in $\varepsilon_F$:
2837: 
2838: $$
2839: T_{\mu\nu}[\mu_{\text{QSD}}] = m\rho \frac{k_B T_{\text{eff}}}{m} g_{\mu\nu} + O(\varepsilon_F)
2840: 
2841: $$
